layers
Class LayerDesc

java.lang.Object
  layers.LayerDesc

public class LayerDesc
extends java.lang.Object

layerDesc.java v.1.0 Provide a complete description of each layer (color, visibility).

The class layerDesc provides a complete description of each layer.
